## Constitution Compliance (Knowledge Network Standards)

- [ ] CHK001 Test-First Development: TDD cycle followed (tests written → approved → fail → implement)
- [ ] CHK002 Clean Code Standards: TypeScript strict config, proper naming conventions, no trash files
- [ ] CHK003 Modern TypeScript: ES2022 target, comprehensive types in `src/types.ts`, modern ES modules
- [ ] CHK004 Build System Integrity: tsup + Vite + pnpm configuration validated, no build corruption
- [ ] CHK005 Documentation: Comprehensive docs in `docs/`, research documentation included
- [ ] CHK006 Performance Requirements: 1000+ nodes capacity, 60fps interactions, progressive loading
- [ ] CHK007 Monorepo Organization: `packages/` structure, `workspace:*` dependencies, modular architecture

## Quality Gates

- [ ] CHK008 Single Working Demo: One integrated demo at localhost:3000/3002, no fragmentation
- [ ] CHK009 Build Validation: D3.js imports correct (not corrupted), library functionality verified
- [ ] CHK010 Constitution Assessment: Run `/speckit.constitution` command for compliance validation
